main.title: Welcome to Promethios
main.description: Let's explore the key features of your cognitive system

steps.title: Operator HUD
steps.content: This is your control center. Monitor system status, alerts, and access settings from here.
steps.sageQuote: The interface between mind and machine begins with awareness of system state.

steps.title: Project Context
steps.content: Switch between different projects to focus Promethios on specific domains or tasks.
steps.sageQuote: Context shapes understanding. Choose wisely to direct cognitive resources.

steps.title: Orchestrator Modes
steps.content: Control how Promethios thinks by switching between FAST, BALANCED, and RESEARCH modes.
steps.sageQuote: Balance speed and depth according to your needs. Each mode offers different cognitive trade-offs.

steps.title: Agent Delegation
steps.content: Delegate specific tasks to specialized agents for optimal performance.
steps.sageQuote: Specialized minds for specialized tasks. Choose the right tool for your cognitive journey.

steps.title: Agent Chat
steps.content: Communicate directly with Promethios agents through this conversational interface.
steps.sageQuote: Through dialogue, we bridge the gap between human intention and machine understanding.

steps.title: Goal Loop Visualization
steps.content: See how Promethios breaks down complex tasks into manageable cognitive loops.
steps.sageQuote: The path of thought becomes visible when we map the journey of understanding.

steps.title: Memory System
steps.content: Explore what Promethios remembers and how it organizes information.
steps.sageQuote: Memory is not just storage, but the foundation of understanding and growth.

steps.title: System Diagnostics
steps.content: Monitor system health, trust scores, and cognitive metrics in real-time.
steps.sageQuote: True understanding requires transparency. These diagnostics reveal the inner workings of the cognitive system.

newUser.title: Getting Started with Promethios
newUser.description: Learn the basics of working with your cognitive assistant

steps.title: Welcome, Operator
steps.content: This is your personal control center for Promethios. You'll find system alerts and settings here.
steps.sageQuote: The journey of a thousand insights begins with a single interface.

steps.title: Start a Conversation
steps.content: The quickest way to begin is by asking a question here in the chat console.
steps.sageQuote: Words are the bridge between minds - speak, and I shall listen.

steps.title: Choose Your Thinking Mode
steps.content: Select how deeply Promethios should think about your questions.
steps.sageQuote: Different questions require different depths of thought.

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Promethios Features
advancedFeatures.description: Discover powerful capabilities for experienced operators

steps.title: Loop Debugging
steps.content: Examine and modify cognitive loops in real-time to improve reasoning.
steps.sageQuote: To understand thought, we must sometimes pause it mid-stream and examine its course.

steps.title: What-If Simulation
steps.content: Test alternative approaches without committing to them.
steps.sageQuote: The multiverse of possibility exists in simulation before reality.

steps.title: Beliefs Explorer
steps.content: Understand the core beliefs that shape Promethios' reasoning.
steps.sageQuote: At the foundation of all reasoning lie the axioms we hold to be true.
